import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, ButtonGroup } from 'reactstrap'; const BtnViagemMotorista = (props) => { const [cSelected, setCSelected] = useState([]); const [rSelected, setRSelected] = useState(null); const onCheckboxBtnClick = (selected) => { const index = cSelected.indexOf(selected); if (index < 0) { cSelected.push(selected); } else { cSelected.splice(index, 1); } setCSelected([...cSelected]); } return (
